main event: A resident of Pasadena observed a red flash in the sky followed by a large ball of fire on June 13, 1954.
interesting points: The witness was viewing television when they saw the flash in the sky., The object appeared to hover quietly before taking off at a high speed., The sighting lasted for about 1 minute., The witness reported that the object left a vapor trail., The object was likened to the speed of an automobile and traveled without noise.
